name: Lunar Escape
description:
A simple obstacle avoidance game. Trek around the planet dodging incoming meteors and planetary eruptions as you wait for your rescue spaceship to arrive.

Controls
Move: A or D / Left or Right Arrow Keys
Quit: Esc
This game has controller support.

Follow Me

Amateur indie dev making small games with Unity while I learn C#. If you want to see what I'm up to come say hi to me on my Twitter. If you're interested in my devlog that I write weekly with progress updates on all the games I'm working on, and want to follow me on my journey as an indie developer, check out my Patreon.
